bibl.title: P. Bodl. I 77: The King of Kings in Arsinoe under Arab Rule.
bibl.note: Revised text and translation. Legal agreement (between 27 March and 25 April 671), reused for a writing exercise. The papyrus provides a new example of a Christian invocation by Christ, Mary and Saints, with the additional description of Christ as 'the king of kings and eternal almighty'.
bibl.seg: GONIS Nikolaos and Klaas A. WORP, P. Bodl. I 77: The King of Kings in Arsinoe under Arab Rule.
